lead_paragraph: Alando Tucker was the Big Ten player of the year last season. He was an all-American. Some draft analysts project him to go to the Portland Trail Blazers. Not with the first pick — as his credentials may suggest — but with the 42nd pick. The rap on him is that he is a little small to play on the perimeter and does not shoot well.
